input_topic: Association of metformin use and cancer incidence

queries.query_string: (metformin OR Glucophage OR biguanide OR dimethylbiguanide) AND (cancer OR neoplasm OR carcinoma OR malignancy OR oncogenesis OR incidence OR risk reduction OR tumor) NOT (systematic review[pt] OR meta-analysis[pt] OR review[pt])
queries.rationale: Uses a wide array of synonyms for both the exposure (metformin) and the outcome (cancer incidence/risk) to maximize recall of diverse terminology, ensuring broad coverage.

queries.query_string: ('Metformin'[MeSH] AND ('Neoplasms'[MeSH] OR 'Cancer Incidence'[MeSH]) AND ('Cohort Studies'[MeSH] OR 'Case-Control Studies'[MeSH])) NOT (systematic review[pt] OR meta-analysis[pt] OR review[pt])
queries.rationale: Leverages controlled vocabulary (MeSH terms) for highly relevant, indexed articles, specifically targeting relevant study designs for incidence reporting.

queries.query_string: (metformin[tiab] AND (cancer incidence[tiab] OR neoplasm risk[tiab])) NOT (systematic review[pt] OR meta-analysis[pt] OR review[pt])
queries.rationale: Restricts key terms to the Title or Abstract fields, prioritizing studies where the association between metformin and cancer incidence is a central focus of the paper.

queries.query_string: (metformin OR Glucophage) AND (cancer OR neoplasm) AND (cohort study[pt] OR case-control study[pt] OR longitudinal studies[mesh]) NOT (systematic review[pt] OR meta-analysis[pt] OR review[pt])
queries.rationale: Explicitly filters for observational study types (cohort, case-control) which are the primary sources for determining long-term incidence associations in real-world populations.

queries.query_string: (metformin OR biguanide) AND (glucose metabolism OR insulin resistance OR AMPK pathway) AND (cancer OR tumor OR malignancy) NOT (systematic review[pt] OR meta-analysis[pt] OR review[pt])
queries.rationale: Includes mechanistic concepts related to metformin's known pathways (e.g., glucose control, AMPK) to capture studies that may frame the association in a physiological context, rather than just clinical terms.

queries.query_string: (metformin AND (cancer OR neoplasm) AND incidence) AND (2014:2024[dp]) NOT (systematic review[pt] OR meta-analysis[pt] OR review[pt])
queries.rationale: Limits the search results to the last decade (2014-2024) to capture the most current and likely highest quality primary research studies on this topic.

queries.query_type: Clinical Trial and Randomized Study Focus
queries.query_string: (metformin AND cancer incidence) AND (randomized controlled trial[pt] OR clinical trial[pt]) NOT (systematic review[pt] OR meta-analysis[pt] OR review[pt])
queries.rationale: Specifically targets high-quality intervention studies (RCTs or clinical trials) that may have recorded cancer incidence as a secondary or long-term outcome.

usage_instructions.api_usage: Use these queries with PubMed E-utilities API
usage_instructions.rate_limiting: Respect NCBI rate limits (3 requests/second max)
